alert.note: Alert for Duval (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 03 at 11:08AM CST until February 04 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 AM CST FRIDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO NOON CST FRIDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, light freezing rain and sleet expected. Total ice accumulations of a light glaze, with little to no sleet accumulation. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 15 degrees. * WHERE...Duval. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 9 PM this evening to 6 AM CST Friday. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from midnight tonight to noon CST Friday. * IMPACTS...Very slippery sidewalks, roads and bridges are possible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. The dangerously cold wind chills could result in hypothermia or frostbite if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
